definition: 〔感情などが〕湧き起こること、動揺
example: Add in jeans, a jean jacket, and T-shirt, all of which had seen better decades, and Lance felt a touch of unease stirring in his belly.
She’d understand if she’d seen the guy. Suspicious, yes, but in retrospect also weirdly cute. Probably way cuter than baby Samantha.
Right there. That little… Ah. Lance gave a whimper as Tim’s lovely scrubbing fingers moved over an itchy place.
God, you could see the man’s distinctly sculpted quad muscles as he walked, not to mention a considerable package. That ought to be illegal. Seriously.
God, you could see the man’s distinctly sculpted quad muscles as he walked, not to mention a considerable package. That ought to be illegal. Seriously.
Excuse me, officer. I want to make a citizen’s arrest for indecent exposure and inciting a riot.
Excuse me, officer. I want to make a citizen’s arrest for indecent exposure and inciting a riot.
The song Tim chose for his moonlight run was We Will Rock You. Lance decided to jog along so he could hear the full rendition clearly.

definition: 《be ～》〈俗〉アンフェタミンを使用中である
example: Lance dashed back and forth around Tim like he was on speed. It was his dog’s way of laughing.
The kiss stripped away the remaining tatters of his doubts and defenses, and Lance knew with certainly, by the swelling of his heart, that he had bonded with Tim completely.
I know we just talked about me being, well, wary of violence? But I want you to know there’s another part of me that really wants you to push me up against a wall someday, Officer.
Out there in the night, naked on a mountain top, with Lance’s beautiful and very male human form, but the beast still prowling just below the skin.
There was something dangerous and primal about the animal nature -- completely unself-conscious, focused, unashamed, and lost in its mate, driven by pure instinct.
